entry.title: Boundary marker, set up by C. Julius Zoilos
entry.summary: Upper right corner of a white marble block (0.36 x 0.24 x 0.34). Inscribed on one face. Date: Late Republican or Augustan (lettering, content). Photo. Recorded by the NYU expedition in 1963 (63.596). Published by Reynolds, Aphrodisias & Rome, doc. 35, whence SEG 1982.1097, BE 1983.388,An.Ã‰p. 1984.878, McCabe PHI Aphrodisias 379, R. R. R. Smith, Aphrodisias I. The monument of C. Julius Zoilos (Mainz, 1993) T5.
